biotools.summary: A practical guide to adjust micronutrient biomarkers for inflammation using the BRINDA method. The BRINDA inflammation adjustment method uses regression correction to adjust for the confounding effects of inflammation on select micronutrient biomarkers and has provided important insights to micronutrient research, policy, and programming.

bioschemas.name: BRINDA
